XmlContext Class Reference

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Default context for deserializing from XML documents via FdoXmlDeserializable.


Public Member Functions

System::String * DecodeName (System::String *name)
 Decodes any element name that was encoded to be XML-compatible.
NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlFlags * GetFlags ()
 Retrieves the current XML flags.
 XmlContext (NAMESPACE_FDO_XML::XmlFlags *flags, NAMESPACE_COMMON_XML::XmlReader *xmlReader)
 Constructs a context for parsing FDO Deserializable items.
